Sentencas: Multi-physics modelling of the Solid Oxide Fuel Cell (SOFC) stack requires significant computational resources.
Titulo: Three-dimensional multi-physics modelling and structural optimization of SOFC large-scale stack and stack tower

Sentencas: Design optimization of large-scale stacks and stack towers has always been a challenge in recent years.
Titulo: Three-dimensional multi-physics modelling and structural optimization of SOFC large-scale stack and stack tower

Sentencas: This study establishes a three-dimensional multi-physics model based on a two-step coupling using the BP neural network.
Titulo: Three-dimensional multi-physics modelling and structural optimization of SOFC large-scale stack and stack tower

Sentencas: The comparison between the novel model and the traditional fully coupled model in both accuracy and computing resource requirements are explored.
Titulo: Three-dimensional multi-physics modelling and structural optimization of SOFC large-scale stack and stack tower

Sentencas: The novel method has high effectiveness for modelling the large-scale stacks.
Titulo: Three-dimensional multi-physics modelling and structural optimization of SOFC large-scale stack and stack tower

Sentencas: Based on this, planar SOFC 50-cell stacks and 150-cell stack towers are simulated.
Titulo: Three-dimensional multi-physics modelling and structural optimization of SOFC large-scale stack and stack tower

Sentencas: The results show that, the flow uniformity of fuel distribution of the stack towers can decrease more than 30% comparing with the 50-cell stack, which leads to significant deterioration of the voltage and temperature distribution.
Titulo: Three-dimensional multi-physics modelling and structural optimization of SOFC large-scale stack and stack tower

Sentencas: The pa-rameters of manifold and buffer area and channel height of the stack tower is optimized to achieve better uniformity of flow and voltage distribution and lower temperature gradient simultaneously.(c) 2022
Titulo: Three-dimensional multi-physics modelling and structural optimization of SOFC large-scale stack and stack tower
